column1: Little Goat Diner////Little Goat Diner is absolutely amazing. For starters
column2: unlike The Girl and the Goat
column3: its sister restaurant across the street
column4: Little Goat does not require reservations. It's also open 24/7 making it the perfect place for a late night snack or a midday meal and guaranteeing that there will be points when there's no line. We walked right in on a Monday night. If you do have to wait
column5: wait at the coffee bar next door
column6: also part of Little Goat. The coffee (and tea) drinks are spectacular and a good way to get started.
